name: ColoradoSpringsGazetteNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Gazette brings you daily headlines in Sports, Business and Arts & Entertainment from Colorado Springs and beyond. Delivering the Springs to your Flash Briefing. 

For over 143 years, The Gazette has played a vital role in the health and prosperity of Colorado Springs. It is essential reading to understand the people, places, issues, and events that affect the quality of life in our market. The Gazette continues to influence Colorado Springs's identity as one of the nation’s most coveted destinations to live, work and play.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
